summary: IGINTION COIL PACK FAILED CAUSING A SUDDEN DECEASE IN POWER AS ONE THE CYLINDERS WAS NOT FIRING.  THIS PROBLEM IS EXTREMELY COMMON AND REQUIRES ALL FOUR COILS TO BE REPLACED.  VW IS ONLY REPLACING THE FAILED COIL BECAUSE OF A SHORTAGE OF PARTS.  THERE SHOULD BE A RECALL WHERE ALL FOUR COILS ARE REPLACED AS THE SUDDEN LOSS OF POWER MAY CAUSE ACCIDENTS AND FATALITIES.
